about.lead: I'm a software developer focused on building intelligent applications that make a real difference. My journey in tech began with curiosity and has evolved into a passion for creating AI-powered solutions.
about.description: From voice-enabled AI agents to machine learning pipelines, I love tackling complex challenges and turning them into elegant, user-friendly products.
